name: blogging
description: Create an array of events in your route handler. This array contains objects that represent an eventâ€™s details. Every event has these attributes - id, title, date, category, price,  isRefundable and isDeleted. isDeleted is a boolean value and for active events the value is false. Consider this event is similar to a Bookmyshow event that a user can book for a specific price. The category can be movie, play, standup-show, workshop etc.
